main_definition: Georgia is primarily known as a U.S. state, but it can also refer to an idiomatic expression related to a place.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A U.S. state located in the southeastern region of the country.
meanings_and_examples.example: I'm planning a trip to Georgia, one of the southern states.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An idiomatic expression referring to someone being slow or taking their time.
meanings_and_examples.example: When it comes to learning new skills, he takes things at a 'Georgia pace', not rushing but ensuring mastery.
